trigger_conditions.description: Trigger when user requests code generation or programming tasks
Trigger on keywords indicating coding intent
Trigger when domain is programming-related

coder_brain.routing_logic: memory_librarian should invoke coder_brain when COMMAND/REQUEST intent is detected AND query contains programming keywords

trigger_conditions.description: Trigger on high-complexity queries requiring multiple perspectives
Trigger when confidence is moderate (uncertain but not impossible)
Trigger on comparative or decision-making queries

committee_brain.routing_logic: integrator_brain should invoke committee_brain when multiple competing responses exist or confidence is moderate

trigger_conditions.description: Trigger on queries requiring hypothetical reasoning or explanation
Trigger on hypothetical phrasing
Trigger when reasoning_brain has no evidence but question is valid

imaginer_brain.routing_logic: reasoning_brain should invoke imaginer_brain when verdict is UNKNOWN/UNANSWERED but query requires speculation

trigger_conditions.description: Only trigger on explicit peer connection operations
Trigger when context contains peer_id indicating multi-agent scenario

peer_connection_brain.routing_logic: integrator_brain invokes peer_connection_brain only when explicitly requested or peer context exists

trigger_conditions.description: Trigger on location or environment queries
Trigger on environment-related keywords

environment_brain.routing_logic: language_brain should route location queries to environment_brain during PARSE stage

trigger_conditions.description: Trigger when input contains audio data
Only trigger on explicit audio analysis requests

hearing_brain.routing_logic: sensorium_brain should invoke hearing_brain when audio input is detected

trigger_conditions.description: Trigger when input contains image data
Only trigger on explicit image analysis requests

vision_brain.routing_logic: sensorium_brain should invoke vision_brain when image input is detected

trigger_conditions.description: Trigger when a plan fails or encounters errors
Trigger on explicit replan requests

replanner_brain.routing_logic: planner_brain or integrator_brain should invoke replanner_brain when plan execution fails

trigger_conditions.description: Trigger on governance or arbitration scenarios
Trigger when conflicting verdicts or decisions need resolution
Only trigger on explicit arbitration requests

council_brain.routing_logic: integrator_brain should invoke council_brain for high-stakes decisions or conflicts

routing_summary.description: Specialist brains are invoked by routing logic in core brains (memory_librarian, integrator_brain, reasoning_brain) based on trigger conditions
notes: All triggers are deterministic - same input always produces same routing decision
Priority values help integrator choose between multiple triggered specialists
